plugins.name: ux
plugins.description: Aesthetic-first UX Team with 10 specialized agent personas and 18 skills for distinctive, memorable frontend design. Includes aesthetic direction, typography curation, color alchemy, layout composition, texture/atmosphere, micro-delights, plus React 19, Vue 3.5, Svelte 5, Tailwind 4.0, WCAG 2.2 accessibility, animations, and data visualization. Fights against generic, template-like designs.
